title: Presidential Nominations Sent To The Senate 5/18/2009 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 18, 2009

 



Presidential Nominations Sent To The Senate 5/18/2009




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary _______________________________________________________ FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                  May 18, 2009   NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE: Zachary J. Lemnios, of Massachusetts, to be Director of Defense Research and Engineering, vice John J. Young, Jr. Anthony W. Miller, of California, to be Deputy Secretary of Education, vice Raymond Simon, resigned. Richard G. Newell, of North Carolina, to be Administrator of the Energy Information Administration, vice Guy F. Caruso. Rosa Gumataotao Rios, of California, to be Treasurer of the United States, vice Anna Escobedo Cabral, resigned.   ##
